personal_connection.name: Personal Connection
prompts: Share a song that reminds you of your childhood
What's a song that always makes you feel better when you're down?
Share a song that tells your life story
What's the first concert you ever attended? Share a song from that artist
Share a song that makes you think of someone special
What's a song that changed how you think about music?

musical_discovery.name: Musical Discovery
prompts: Share your favorite underrated artist
What's a song from a genre you usually don't listen to, but love anyway?
Share a song from your country/region that everyone should know
What's a cover song that's better than the original?
Share a song that was released this year that you think will be a classic
What's the most unique song in your playlist?

emotional.name: Emotional
prompts: Share a song that makes you want to dance no matter what
What song never fails to give you goosebumps?
Share a song that makes you cry (in a good way)
What's your go-to karaoke song?
Share a song that motivates you
What's a song that brings back strong memories?

discussion_starters.name: Discussion Starters
prompts: Share a song with lyrics that hit different after you learned their meaning
What's a song everyone loves that you can't stand?
Share a "guilty pleasure" song from your playlist
What's a song you think deserves more recognition?
Share a song with an amazing music video
What's a song that perfectly captures a specific emotion?

situational.name: Situational
prompts: Share your favorite road trip song
What's your go-to workout track?
Share a song perfect for a rainy day
What's your favorite song to cook to?
Share a song that helps you focus while working/studying
What's your perfect sunset song?

fun_challenges.name: Fun Challenges
prompts: Share a song using only emojis and let the other person guess
Pick a year and share your favorite song from then
Share a song with no words that tells a story
What's a song with your favorite instrumental break?
Share a song where the title doesn't appear in the lyrics
Find a song you both know and share your different interpretations

deep_dive.name: Deep Dive
prompts: Share a song and explain exactly what makes it special to you
What's a song that represents a turning point in music history?
Share a song that showcases exceptional musicianship
What's a song that perfectly captures its era?
Share a song that tells a great story
What's a song with production that amazes you?

ice_breaker_games.name: Ice Breaker Games
prompts: "Speed Round": Share songs back and forth in specific categories (happy songs, sad songs, etc.)
"Musical Time Machine": Take turns sharing songs from different decades
"Genre Challenge": Share songs from genres outside your comfort zone
"Six Degrees": Connect two completely different songs through a chain of related tracks
"Soundtrack of Your Life": Share songs that represent different chapters of your life
"Musical Would You Rather": Present two songs/artists and discuss preferences
